Name: Everest Truck Simulator
About the game: Do you smell this? It smells like manhood and courage! Welcome to the national army in this simulation realistic game! Everyone relies on you because your mission will be a difficult one, namely you must to be responsible for everything related to transportation, starting with soldiers and ending with army equipment. Nothing will happen without your participation. There is no pressure on you, but a lot of responsibility is required to get from point A to point B safely. Rule number 1 - no one should know about rule number 2,3,4.. That's why we took you, because the army needs trained and absolutely secretive people. Are you ready ? Game Features : - 3 Game Modes ( Soldier Transport,Cargo Transport and Vehicle Transport) - Each mode has 10 levels - Truck Damage & Map
